channel.title: Board on Associazione dei Ricercatori Italiani in Giappone

item.title: Sarah Cosentino
item.description: Associate Professor at Waseda University. My main technical interests are human movement and performance analysis, human-robot interaction, Machine Learning and AI.

item.title: Nathan Shammah
item.description: Postdoctoral Researcher in Quantum Physics at RIKEN.

item.title: Claudio Feliciani
item.description: Project Assistant Professor at The University of Tokyo.

item.title: Marco Pellegrini
item.description: Advanced Simulation Team, Leader at The Institute of Applied Energy at Tokyo Institute of Technology.

item.description: Lecturer of European Union law at University of Kobe.

item.title: Silvia Bolzani
item.description: JSPS Postdoctoral Researcher Laboratory of Epigenetics and Metabolism, Institute for Molecular and Cellular Regulation (IMCR), Gunma University.
